article_title: Mother of 2 stabbed to death in Silverton, first homicide in town since 1985 – The Denver Post
article_text:
DURANGO, Colo. (AP) — San Juan County authorities are investigating the fatal stabbing of a 32-year-old mother of two in Silverton.

The Durango Herald reports (http://bit.ly/1ibx2UK ) Jessica McFarland was stabbed to death at about 1:45 a.m. Friday. Her husband, Michael McFarland, was arrested and is being held on suspicion of second-degree murder.

Authorities have not said what led to the stabbing, which marks the first homicide in the town since 1985.

___

Information from: Durango Herald, http://www.durangoherald.com
